name: dozy
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
informal tired and wanting to sleep: Drinking a beer at lunchtime makes me feel dozy all afternoon.
UK informal thinking or reacting slowly: He'd have driven straight into me if I hadn't seen him first - the dozy idiot!
